actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to amend the Act to authorize appropriations for the fiscal year 1980 for certain maritime programs of the Department of Commerce.

summary.text: Amends the Maritime Appropriation Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 1980 to increase the authorization of appropriations, from $256,208,000 to $300,515,000, for fiscal year 1980 for use by the Department of Commerce for payments of obligations incurred for the ship operating-differential subsidy.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act to authorize appropriations for the fiscal year 1980 for certain maritime programs of the Department of Commerce.
